title: SGS Solutions marketing website (computer sales & service) — frontend plan

requirements.summary: Build a responsive multi-page marketing site for SGS Solutions with consistent navigation, footer, and polished English copy.
acceptanceCriteria: Site has a consistent header navigation and footer on all pages.
All pages are responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and readable.
All user-facing copy is in English and references SGS Solutions consistently.

file_operations.description: Create the app shell with client-side routing for all required pages and wrap routes with a shared layout so header/footer remain consistent across pages.

Implement a responsive layout with a reusable Header + Footer (SGS Solutions branding, nav links, and consistent spacing). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., navigation, buttons, separators) to compose UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a responsive header with logo, navigation links (Home, Products, Services, About, Contact, Inbox), and a mobile menu affordance. Use shadcn-ui components to compose UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a site-wide footer with contact details, business hours (placeholder), and quick links; ensure responsive layout. Use shadcn-ui components to compose UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement core pages: Home, Products, Services, About, Contact, with required sections and CTAs.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes: hero, 3–6 value props, featured Products/Services previews, and a prominent CTA button leading to Contact.
Products page lists at least 3 product categories (e.g., laptops, desktops, accessories) with short descriptions and placeholder items.
Services page lists at least 4 services (e.g., repairs, upgrades, diagnostics, maintenance) with clear descriptions.
About page includes a brief company story/mission and a “Why choose us” section.
Contact page includes contact info and a contact form.

file_operations.description: Create the Home page with hero section, 3–6 value propositions, featured Products/Services previews, and a prominent CTA that navigates to the Contact page. Use shadcn-ui components (cards, buttons, typography helpers) for polished marketing sections. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the Products page listing at least 3 categories (e.g., Laptops, Desktops, Accessories) with short descriptions and placeholder items presented in responsive cards/grids. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the Services page with at least 4 clearly described services (repairs, upgrades, diagnostics, maintenance) and supporting trust copy. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the About page with a short company story/mission plus a “Why choose us” section (bullets/metrics) styled consistently. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the Contact page with contact info (email/phone/address placeholders) and embed the Contact form component from REQ-3. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire newly created pages into the router and ensure navigation links in the layout route to these pages (no orphan pages).

requirements.summary: Add a Contact form UI with validation and success/error submission states.
acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields and email format before submission.
Submit button shows loading state while submitting.
On success, form clears and shows a success message; on failure, shows an error message.

file_operations.description: Implement the Contact form UI with fields: name (required), email (required), phone (optional), subject (required), message (required). Add client-side validation (required + email format), accessible error messages, loading state on submit, and success/error banners. Use shadcn-ui form inputs, labels, buttons, and alert components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a React Query mutation hook that calls the backend actor's submitForm capability and maps UI fields into the backend payload (e.g., include subject/phone within the submitted message text if needed). Handle loading/error states for the UI.

Integrate the ContactForm component into the Contact page and ensure success clears the form and provides user feedback. Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an authenticated Inbox page (Internet Identity) to view stored contact submissions read-only with empty/loading/error states.
acceptanceCriteria: When not logged in, the Inbox page prompts the user to sign in.
When logged in, the Inbox page displays a list of submissions with timestamp, name, email, subject, and message.
Inbox gracefully handles empty state and loading/error states.

file_operations.description: Create a read-only Inbox page. If not authenticated (no Internet Identity), show a sign-in prompt and login button; if authenticated, fetch and render submissions with timestamp, name, email, subject, and message, plus empty/loading/error states. Use the authorization component patterns for authenticated UI flows. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a React Query hook that calls the backend actor's getSubmissions capability with a reasonable limit and returns loading/error/data states for the Inbox UI.

Add a reusable Login/Logout button using Internet Identity (useInternetIdentity). On logout, clear cached queries to remove restricted data. Use guidance from the authorization component. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a first-login profile setup dialog (ask for user name) using getCallerUserProfile/saveCallerUserProfile and prevent modal flash per authorization component guidance. Use shadcn-ui dialog/form components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a simple auth gate component for protected pages (Inbox) that renders the sign-in prompt when not authenticated and renders children when authenticated. Use authorization component guidance. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register the Inbox route and wrap it with RequireAuth (or gate within the Inbox page) so access requires Internet Identity login; ensure header navigation includes an Inbox link.

Add LoginButton placement in the header (or a clear location) and ensure the Inbox nav item is present and responsive. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Define and apply a coherent professional theme (non-blue/non-purple primary) across the site.
acceptanceCriteria: A single consistent theme is applied across pages (buttons, cards, headings, links).
Color palette does not rely on blue/purple as the primary brand colors.
Typography and spacing are consistent and readable.

file_operations.description: Create global styles and Tailwind base layer (including CSS variables used by shadcn-ui) and define a cohesive SGS Solutions palette with non-blue/non-purple primary colors (e.g., charcoal + green/orange accents), consistent typography, spacing, and focus styles. Verify shadcn-ui theming usage instructions before implementing.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions as needed to support SGS Solutions brand tokens (colors/radius/shadows/typography) and ensure consistent usage across components.

Apply consistent container widths, vertical rhythm, and section spacing across pages; ensure header/footer styling aligns with the global theme. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add SEO + accessibility essentials: per-page titles/meta descriptions, semantic headings, keyboard navigation, and accessible form labels/errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets a distinct document title and meta description.
All form fields have associated labels and accessible error messages.
Site is usable via keyboard navigation and has sensible focus states.
Headings use a logical hierarchy (H1 then H2/H3).

file_operations.description: Create a small hook to set document.title and ensure a meta description tag exists/updates per page without adding new dependencies.

Apply semantic heading hierarchy (single H1 for page title/hero) and call usePageMeta with a distinct title and meta description. Ensure keyboard focus order is sensible. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Set page title/meta description via usePageMeta and ensure headings follow H1/H2/H3 structure. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Set page title/meta description via usePageMeta and ensure semantic structure. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Set page title/meta description via usePageMeta and ensure semantic structure. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Set page title/meta description via usePageMeta and ensure semantic structure; ensure contact info is readable and accessible.

Ensure each field has an associated label, required markers are accessible, validation errors are announced (aria-describedby/role where appropriate), and keyboard navigation works end-to-end. Use shadcn-ui form components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Set page title/meta description via usePageMeta and ensure accessible list rendering, focus states, and keyboard navigability. Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Include generated static brand images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (logo in header, hero visual on Home, service icons).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Header displays the SGS Solutions logo.
Home hero includes a relevant illustration/visual.

file_operations.description: Add the generated brand logo image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-logo.dim_512x512.png.
Add the generated hero illustration asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png.
Add the generated service icons sprite/image asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-service-icons.dim_512x512.png.

Render the SGS Solutions logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header branding area (with accessible alt text). Use shadcn-ui components where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render the hero visual from frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png within the Home hero section and incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/sgs-service-icons.dim_512x512.png in the featured services/value props area (with accessible alt text). Use shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
